title: Nursing Home Cited 7 Times by Inspectors Before Legionnaires’ Outbreak
description: But the Manhattan facility, Amsterdam Nursing Home, was far from the only home flagged in New York City for failing to take steps to prevent the spread of the airborne infection.
dc:creator: Adeel Hassan
media:credit: Benjamin Norman for The New York Times
media:description: Health officials have confirmed that Amsterdam Nursing Home in Manhattan was the site of the deadliest outbreak of Legionnaires’ disease since 2015.
